title: Run Monkey Run HD.apk
description:
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	There are many games in the market which are time surfers. But very few of them are addictive. 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Run monkey run is one such time surfer as well as addictive amazing runner game. Run monkey run is an amazing runner game that will keep you glued. 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	The player controls the monkey that runs through the Amazon jungle collecting bananas and avoiding obstacles. The monkey also has to be careful as to not fall off the platform.
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Controls are: 
-	Swipe up to jump
-	Swipe down to slide
-	Shake device after jumping for double jump

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Gameplay
-The player controls a monkey running in the jungle. As the game begins, the monkey starts running. It then proceeds to run forward automatically like a Jetpack Joyrider. The controls the player has over the character is through swipe, which makes it jump; either from platform to platform or over obstacles. Missing a jump to another platform will cause it to fall and have Knightmare Tower, also colliding with a obstacle will cause it to go into the dead.

- Unlike many other platform games which have predesigned stages and can be played to completion, the landscape of Run Monkey Run is like Canabalt which is procedurally generated and endless. If the player after jumping sees a obstacle and knows that it is dead ahead then he can shake the device to double jump. The monkey has a worm run or a slow run, if the player wants to accelerate he has to click the cross button given which would give punch quest in the game for a limited time. 

-The objective of the game is to achieve the highest score, measured in meters per run. Some version of the game feature online leaderboards, allowing players to compete for outland games ranking.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	If you like Temple run, Canabalt HD, Jetpack Joyride, Sonic Dash, Outland Games, Into the Dead, Catch the Ark, Knightmare Tower HD, Dead Ahead, Time Surfer HD, Worm Run, Tiny Wings HD, Robot Unicorn Attack, Zombie Tsunami, Save Them All, Amazing Runner, Pitfall, Ronin HD, Punch Quest you will like Run Monkey Run.
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	This amazing runner canabalt monkey loves to eat bananas with a jetpack joyride. It can go into sonic dash or pitfall with a single miscalculation. Do not try to catch the ark or you will have a nightmare tower into the dead. Judge where to take worm run and where to get tiny wings or you will be dead ahead. Bananas are okay to be missed at times no need to save them all, your punch quest in this outland game is to run maximum distance. Jump over the pitfall to save your life as there are no more lives to save them all.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Features of the game:
-	The game is similar to temple run or canabalt game.
-	Run Monkey Run is a time surfer outland game.
-	Monkey takes jetpack joyride with worm run or tiny wings speed.
-	It can be single player or multi player game. You can challenge your friends on leader boards.
-	Challenge your friends online to a match by tapping on the Run Monkey Run leader board button and then the challenge button!
-	Bananas Ã¢â‚¬â€œ DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t go to save them all.
-	There are two kinds of speed Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Worm run and tiny wings.
-	Like temple run and canabalt, sonic dash into the dead or skip the dead ahead. Sonic dash into the pitfall and youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll fall down the knightmare tower. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t catch the arcÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ catch the arc ad you are dead.
-	Being based on real and accurate physics with some toony effect, it is probably the most addictive endless runner game on mobiles!
-	A perfect time killer!
